show_name: King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars
opening_theme: "Shiny Seven Stars!" by Shin Ichijou (Junta Terashima), Yukinojou Tachibana (Souma Saitou), Taiga Kougami (Tasuku Hatanaka), Kakeru Juuouin (Taku Yashiro), Minato Takahashi (Masashi Igarashi), Leo Saionji (Takuma Nagatsuka), Yuu Suzuno (Yuuma Uchida)

#06: "Love & Peace Forever" by Leo Saionji (Takuma Nagatsuka) (ep 7)

#09: "Ai ga Mou Sukoshi Hoshii yo (愛がもう少し欲しいよ)" by Rui Kisaragi (Aoi Shouta) (ep 10)
#10: "BRAND NEW TOMORROW" by Shin Ichijou (Junta Terashima) (ep 11)
